Wagner Graduate School of Public Service      School of Continuing and Professional Studies      School of Law      School of Medicine      Silver School of Social Work      Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development      Tisch School of the Arts                                         Search        go                                                               New York University              New York University              Office of the Bursar                                                         eSuite Information                                        Payment Information                               Steps to Take After Registering                          Account Balance                          Financial Clearance                          Payment Deadline Dates                          Payment Plans                           Methods of Payment                                Electronic Check                                 Personal Check                                Wire Transfer                                  Third Party Payment                                Tuition Remission                                529 Plan                                                                                  Loans and NY State Tap Awards                                     Tuition and Fees                                     Your Account                                     Refunds                                      Tax Topics                                           Forms                                           Services                                               Home        |        Payment Information                 |        Methods of Payment                 |         Personal Check                                                If you are paying by personal check, the check must be payable to New York University in U.S. currency and be drawn on a bank in the U.S. Please write your student ID number on your check. Postdated checks will not be accepted.      Please mail check only to (please write NYUID on check):            New York University      General P.O. Box 30826      New York, NY 10087-0826                  *All express mail or extraneous material must be mailed to:         New York University        Office of the Bursar   Student Services Center   25 West 4th Street, 1st Floor      New York, NY 10012                 If a check is returned, the    student will be charged a $20.00 returned check fee and a $25.00 late payment fee. Students will also be prevented    from using paper/electronic personal checks in the future.

Wagner Graduate School of Public Service      School of Continuing and Professional Studies      School of Law      School of Medicine      Silver School of Social Work      Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development      Tisch School of the Arts                                         Search        go                                                               New York University              New York University              Office of the Bursar                                                         eSuite Information                                        Payment Information                               Steps to Take After Registering                          Account Balance                          Financial Clearance                          Payment Deadline Dates                          Payment Plans                           Methods of Payment                                Electronic Check                                Personal Check                                Wire Transfer                                  Third Party Payment                                Tuition Remission                                529 Plan                                                                                  Loans and NY State Tap Awards                                     Tuition and Fees                                     Your Account                                     Refunds                                      Tax Topics                                           Forms                                           Services                                               Home        |        Payment Information                 |         Methods of Payment                                                           The balance due on your Statement of Account can be paid with electronic checks, personal checks, bank drafts, money orders, and/or wire transfers. If your account requires payment by certified check or money order, you may not make payment by electronic check.                    Electronic Check            Personal Check          Wire Transfer (for students who do not have a U.S. checking account)      Third Party Payment      Tuition Remission      529 plan mailing information                   *Please Note: Credit Cards are no longer accepted as a method of paying charges on your student bill as of December 1, 2010. Click here for a list of Frequently Asked Questions

Wagner Graduate School of Public Service      School of Continuing and Professional Studies      School of Law      School of Medicine      Silver School of Social Work      Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development      Tisch School of the Arts                                         Search        go                                                               New York University              New York University              Office of the Bursar                                                         eSuite Information                                        Payment Information                               Steps to Take After Registering                          Account Balance                          Financial Clearance                          Payment Deadline Dates                          Payment Plans                           Methods of Payment                                Electronic Check                                Personal Check                                 Wire Transfer                                  Third Party Payment                                Tuition Remission                                529 Plan                                                                                  Loans and NY State Tap Awards                                     Tuition and Fees                                     Your Account                                     Refunds                                      Tax Topics                                           Forms                                           Services                                               Home        |        Payment Information                 |        Methods of Payment                 |         Wire Transfer                                                       New York University has contracted with Western Union Business Solutions to facilitate wire transfer payments from non-U.S. bank accounts.    This payment option allows you to pay your student account balance in a number of currencies, provides a secure way of initiating payments electronically and incorporates pertinent student information to ensure timely crediting of the payment to the student’s bill. NYU and Western Union do not charge a fee for this service; however, you may incur wire transfer fees from your financial institution.    If you want to wire transfer a payment from a U.S. bank account, you may also use this Western Union service; however, we recommend using eCheck in eSuite because it is a less costly and more efficient method for payments from U.S. bank accounts.           Steps To Make A Student Payment
